description: Working on onboarding team to build risk asisessment BRE system.
Optimizing application performance and ensuring scalability in onboarding.
Built full-stack features in Kotlin & TypeScript for multiple consoles.
Automated competitor-account APIs, cutting setup errors by 70%.
Enhanced data workflows & improved MM and Pricing console efficiency.
Engineered resilient pricing pipelines with 99% uptime & live insights.
Built a real-time grievance redressal app using ChromaDB + Mistral 7B/LLaMA 2 for interaction & info extraction.
Fine-tuned BART for zero-shot hierarchical classification of government departments, integrated into chatbot workflows.
Developed a GenAI-based solution for automating data extraction from unstructured documents, cutting handling time by 5 mins/task.
Built AI workflows removing a QC layer, streamlining operations.
Led AI prototype development, solving complex client challenges & reducing costs.
Collaboratively designed and developed the backend architecture.
Built a dynamic landing page and admin panel web app with role-based access controls.
